name: Moa VR
description:
Be the carer of New Zealand's extinct, flightless bird: the Moa.

This game is the product of 5-weeks worth of work for a University assignment. The source code is also available, so feel free to hack this game out!

Features

  • Interactive learning about the Moa: Dietary needs, size, sounds, etc.
  • Fight against the Haast Eagle – A longlife rival.

Credits

Programmers

  • Juan Rodriguez (@timrodz)
  • Mitchell Currie (@MitchJCurrie)
  • Charmaine Lim

Artists

  • Derek Nicoll
  • Thomas Greentree

Requirements

  • HTC Vive
  • Windows 7+
  • Graphics card: Nvidia GTX 970 or better (Due to VR)
  • To edit: Unity 5.6.0f3 / HTC Vive SDK
